about_the_game:
Welcome to Automatica, a 2D Automation and Factory game inspired by titles like Shapez and Factorio

Unique Conveyor Belt System

In this unique automation game, I've added a twist to the traditional conveyor belt system – connecting building is now as simple as dragging a line from one node into another

Sell Resources for Money

Earn money to place more Nodes by launching resources into space

Big Research Tree

Unlock additional Nodes in the Research Tree using higher-quality resources

You’re the last Hope for Earth

Your mission? Use machines called Nodes to mine various ores and fluids, helping the people on Earth who have run out of resources

Thanks :)

I've poured my heart into creating this game, and I genuinely hope you enjoy it as much as I do. I would greatly appreciate any feedback. <3
